metadata.title: CVE-2024-45609 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a Free Asset and IT Management Software package, Data centermanagement, ITIL Service Desk, licenses tracking and software auditing. Anunauthenticated user can provide a malicious link to a GLPI technician inorder to exploit a reflected XSS vulnerability located in the reportspages. Upgrade to 10.0.17.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
